statements: DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE login_time < '2022-01-01' AND success = false AND is_suspicious = true;
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 123 AND status = 'failed';
DELETE FROM suspicious_attempts WHERE status = 'blocked' AND reason LIKE '%suspicious%';
DELETE FROM suspicious_logins WHERE login_id = 2 AND reason = 'Suspicious Activity';
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE id = 1 AND username = 'john_doe'
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'admin')
DELETE FROM suspicious_logins WHERE user_id = 100 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM suspicious_logins WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.100' AND reason = 'Suspicious activity detected';
